summary: CONTACTED DEALER IN 2016 ABOUT TAKATA RECALL.  TOLD ME THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE.  CONTACTED DEALER IN OCT 2017 AGAIN, TOLD THE PARTS WERE STILL NOT AVAILABLE.  I BELIEVE THE GENERAL MOTORS HAS HAD SUFFICIENT TIME TO ACQUIRE REPLACEMENT AIR BAG INFLATOR AND THAT THEY ARE DELIBERATELY STALLING HOPING THE PROBLEM WILL SIMPLE GO AWAY.  I NEED MY TRUCK FIXED SO THAT MY WIFE CAN RIDE WITH ME ON TRIPS.
